title: Ticket #7658: Schedd.edit should take non-string primitives
description: The Schedd.edit method currently only takes strings for its value argument. Since we already have code to convert Python primitives like ints into ClassAd values, we should do that here too, so that users can do things like schedd.edit("foo", 1) instead of schedd.edit("foo", "1").
remarks:
2020-Jun-26 15:44:20 by karpel:
Per https://lists.cs.wisc.edu/archive/htcondor-users/2020-June/msg00133.shtml , this is also a problem in htcondor._Param
creator: karpel
